title: Bug 45145: Second window comes to front when using first
description: When switching from another application to one Eclipse window and clicking on a docked view or perspective, the other window comes to the front, overlapping other applications' windows.
OB: Upon switching to one Eclipse window and clicking on a docked view or perspective, the second window comes to the front, covering other applications' windows.
EB: Upon switching to one Eclipse window and clicking on a docked view or perspective, the expected behavior is that the active window remains in front without overlapping other applications' windows.
SR:
1. Open two Eclipse windows.
2. Switch from another application to one Eclipse window.
3. Click on a docked view or perspective.
4. Observe that the other window comes to the front, overlapping other applications' windows.
